Class LocalPlayer

java.lang.Object
scrabble.model.Player
scrabble.model.LocalPlayer
public class LocalPlayer extends Player
This class represents the player who is on this computer

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalPlayer

      public LocalPlayer​(String name, int ID, ArrayList<Tile> rack)
      Constructs a localPlayer object
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player. Must be at least three characters
      ID - the player's id, which corresponds to their order
      rack - the tiles the player has

    • LocalPlayer

      public LocalPlayer​(String name, int ID)
      Constructs a LocalPlayer object with a specified name and ID. The player's rack will be initialized to null.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player. Must be at least three characters
      ID - the player's ID, which corresponds to their order of play.

  • Method Details

    • getRack

      public ArrayList<Tile> getRack()
      Getter for the player's rack of tiles.
      Returns:
      an array of tiles currently held by the player.

    • removeTiles

      public void removeTiles​(Tile[] tiles)
      Removes specified tiles from the player's rack.
      Parameters:
      tiles - the tiles to remove from the rack. This method will need to be implemented to update the rack accordingly.

    • addTiles

      public void addTiles​(Tile[] tiles)
      Adds specified tiles to the player's rack.
      Parameters:
      tiles - the tiles to add to the rack. This method will need to be implemented to update the rack accordingly.
